TopicTitle: Possible Bug? 'Slopes' biome registers as 'Lowlands' on Minmus.

Articles.Content:
I'm just wondering if anyone else has come across this problem. I went on a science expedition on Minmus and managed to get science from every biome except the slopes. Whenever I try, the game thinks I'm in the Minmus 'Lowlands'. Obviously slopes is a transitional biome, however, I have tried on all locations on hills where slopes should be and the biome still never registers. Even when I'm in an area where there should be no lowland biomes for kilometers the game still gives me the science for it.

I am nearly certain that this isn't user error and that the game is registering the slopes as 'Lowlands'. Can anyone confirm this?

(I'm play the Xbox Enhanced Edition)

Edited January 23, 2018 by Eterna1Soldier
